fields.request: Manual QA: Exercise Task Categories for Manual Tasks
fields.request_details: Create a Task Category with a Markdown description, cost, and availability option. Use the Odoo Product selector to link a sample product and assign requestor/assignee groups. Upload a lightweight placeholder image if available. Save the category, then open the Manual Tasks admin and assign it to a task. Confirm the category shows in the list column and category filter, and that the task form renders the category dropdown without errors.
